commit message: Material Design for Android 5.0 (with ActionBarDrawerToggle menu to icon animation)
Launch mode 'singleTop' for the main activities.
Fixes Issue #2 : Uses maven central for ormlite-library in gradle build.
Navigation drawer works now with fragments instead of activities (improved UX!).
Small fix for configuration change and action bar title.
Fix for wrong x-label rendering on the chart.
Disabling X and Y zoom in the chart library (this is currently not supported by the library).
Changing version to 2.2 and the update of the APK.
